== About Me ==
{{https://launchpadlibrarian.net/56920867/192_192.png}}<<BR>>
I'm a Computer Science student from Srinagar, Kashmir studying at the University of Pune. I love Kashmir, Programming, FOSS and Ubuntu. I mostly hangout @ #quickly, #ubuntu on Freenode and #fosskashmir on OFTC.
